document.full_text: greece will not hold a referendum on additional austerity measures to deal with its debt crisis or on whether voters want to remain in the common currency, the government spokesman said on wednesday.
document.title: greece rules out referendum on austerity, euro
lines_and_colors: greece will not hold a referendum on additional austerity measures to deal with its debt crisis or on whether voters want to remain in the common currency, the government spokesman said on wednesday.
